Lego sets [make incredible gifts](https://www.engadget.com/computing/the-best-tech-gifts-and-cool-gadgets-for-2025-140052697.html), at least according to our 12-year-old selves â€” and as people who review software instead of getting real jobs, we're very in touch with our inner children around here. And those inner children are squealing at some of the Black Friday and Cyber Monday Lego deals we're already seeing, from crossovers like Disney, Star Wars and Harry Potter to Lego's own brands like Creator and Botanicals. It's only likely to get better, so keep checking regularly.

We always recommend using a [price tracker](https://camelcamelcamel.com/) to determine if a Lego deal is in fact a good one. You'll find Lego deals across the board this holiday season at retailers like [Amazon](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL3M_&signature=AQAAAWuKMcAAurSWO8qBXo-P0E9v-yEHTM1oQ3zEQIkMkADP&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fs%3Fk%3Dlego%26rh%3Dp_n_deal_type%253A23566065011) and [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&_cG92aWQ9RVRTX0QwN19WU0JfQnVpbGRpbmdTZXRzX1ZGX0JSTkRfU1JDSC1MRUdPU2VhcmNoX0xFR09CcmFuZFNob3AifQ&signature=AQAAAdwPsGweZwvDenAHQHxCAQWT1upABTu39LrKo37hXqan&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fbrand%2Flego%2F10030096%3Fpovid%3DETS_D07_VSB_BuildingSets_VF_BRND_SRCH-LEGOSearch_LEGOBrandShop), but don't overlook [Lego's own site](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Lego%27s+own+site&&signature=AQAAAaU4kmNkt-R-vq0q8OYFvVhNpzh7oDicxOUmH1u3S51i&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fcategories%2Fsales-and-deals). If you join the free [Lego Insiders](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Lego+Insiders&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5sZWdvLmNvbS9lbi11cy9pbnNpZGVycyIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiMDQ5NjFkMmItMTFjNy00NmVlLWFkOTgtMDJjNThlNWNkM2FlIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5sZWdvLmNvbS9lbi11cy9pbnNpZGVycyJ9&signature=AQAAAZRfwWYilXr2qk-TA5iU_l3-6c1ZI-XA3Le1Eag1rP2M&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Finsiders) program, you'll build up points with each purchase that you can redeem in the future, get special discounts and sometimes get exclusive gifts when you buy.

While not a deal, arguably the hottest Lego for Black Friday will be the brand new [Star Trek USS Enterprise set](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Star+Trek+USS+Enterprise+set&&signature=AQAAARUtc9wUgmXIWwHjv3QmTF6WAd-Q_B4XT65oFUNHyfZZ&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fstar-trek-u-s-s-enterprise-ncc-1701-d-10356), which was [announced](https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/legos-star-trek-uss-enterprise-set-arrives-on-black-friday-173414532.html) recently. It has a whopping 3,600 pieces and will be a must-have for any Star Trek fans. The set will be available starting November 28 for $400.
